rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes an action factually.
The segment describes actions by other countries (halted imports) which are financial metrics.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual event/impact but contains no explicit calming cue.
Segment does not contain a minimiser + scale contrast.
The segment describes countries halting imports but contains no bare negation.
The segment reports countries halting imports.
The segment reports actions by countries, not primarily prices or metrics.
The segment reports a past event, not speculation about future relief or improvement.
No direct quote or attributed statement providing a dominant frame.
Factual report of actions taken by countries without explicit framing cues.
